title: The Climates of North America
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Joseph Koenig
brief_description: The film shows what climate is and how it shapes the vegetation and the life of the inhabitants of North America’s climatic regions - from the North Pole to the Tropic of Cancer.
